hmac
----

Software implementation in C of the FIPS 198 Keyed-Hash Message
Authentication Code HMAC for SHA2 (namely HMAC-SHA-224, HMAC-SHA-256,
HMAC-SHA-384, and HMAC-SHA-512).

Homepage: https://github.com/ogay/hmac

Copyright: Copyright (C) 2005 Olivier Gay <olivier.gay@a3.epfl.ch>

License: BSD-3-Clause

Version: 2013-03-04 (5efc450f9dd204059b2f29808deaf2f8239b8129)
